words.source: H3212 (הלך), HVqv2ms (Qal-imperative-2ms). KJV 'Go', ESV 'Go', NASB 'Go'. All agree.
H622 (אסף), HC/Vqq2ms (conjunctive/Qal-perfect-2ms, sequential future). KJV 'and gather', ESV 'and gather', NASB 'and gather'.
H853 (אֵת), HTo (direct object marker). Untranslated in English.
H2205 (זָקֵן), HAampc (adjective-mp-construct). KJV 'the elders of', ESV 'the elders of', NASB 'the elders of'.
H3478 (יִשְׂרָאֵל), HNp (proper noun). KJV, ESV, NASB all render 'Israel'.
H559 (אמר), HC/Vqq2ms (conjunctive/Qal-perfect-2ms, sequential future). KJV 'and say', ESV 'and say', NASB 'and say'.
H413 (אֶל), HR/Sp3mp (preposition/suffix-3mp). KJV 'unto them', ESV 'to them', NASB 'to them'.
H3068 (יְהוָה), HNp (proper noun, the divine name). KJV 'The LORD', ESV 'The LORD', NASB 'The LORD'.
H430 (אֱלֹהִים), HNcmpc (noun-common-mp-construct). KJV 'God of', ESV 'God of', NASB 'God of'.
H1 (אָב), HNcmpc/Sp2mp (noun-common-mp-construct/suffix-2mp). KJV 'your fathers', ESV 'your fathers', NASB 'your fathers'.
H7200 (ראה), HVNp3ms (Niphal-perfect-3ms). KJV 'appeared', ESV 'appeared', NASB 'appeared'. All agree.
H413 (אֶל), HR/Sp1cs (preposition/suffix-1cs). KJV 'unto me', ESV 'to me', NASB 'to me'.
H430 (אֱלֹהִים), HNcmpc (noun-common-mp-construct). KJV 'the God of', ESV 'the God of', NASB 'the God of'.
H85 (אַבְרָהָם), HNp (proper noun). KJV, ESV, NASB all render 'Abraham'.
H3327 (יִצְחָק), HNp (proper noun). KJV, ESV, NASB all render 'Isaac'.
H3290 (יַעֲקֹב), HC/Np (conjunctive/proper noun). KJV, ESV, NASB all render 'and Jacob'.
H559 (אמר), HR/Vqc (preposition-lamed/Qal-infinitive-construct). KJV 'saying', ESV 'saying', NASB 'saying'.

H6485 (פקד), HVqa (Qal-infinitive-absolute). DIVERGENT: Infinitive absolute + finite verb construction emphasizing certainty. KJV 'I have surely visited', ESV 'I have observed', NASB 'I am indeed concerned about'. KJV preserves the Hebrew emphatic construction most literally.
H6485 (פקד), HVqp1cs (Qal-perfect-1cs). DIVERGENT: KJV 'visited you', ESV 'observed you', NASB 'am concerned about you'. The root פקד means 'to attend to, visit, take note of, appoint'.
H853 (אֵת), HTo/Sp2mp (direct object marker/suffix-2mp). KJV 'you', ESV 'you', NASB 'you'.
H853 (אֵת), HC/To (conjunctive/direct object marker). Untranslated except for conjunction.
H6213 (עשׂה), HTd/Vqsmsa (article/Qal-passive-participle-ms-absolute). KJV 'that which is done', ESV 'what has been done', NASB 'what has been done'.
Preposition lamed + suffix 2mp. KJV 'to you', ESV 'to you', NASB 'to you'.
H4714 (מִצְרַיִם), HR/Np (preposition-beth/proper noun). KJV 'in Egypt', ESV 'in Egypt', NASB 'in Egypt'.
